function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;

var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

Product Description

DOWELL 185 Piece Household Tool Set

This tool kit is a great choice for most small repairs and DIY projects around the house and office, such as repairing, outdoor fittings, garden decoration, garage construction, car overhaul, furniture assembling, etc.

It includes most daily use hand tools：

·8” Adjustable Wrench ·8oz/0.25kg Claw Hammer

·Stainless Steel Scissors ·10ft / 3mtr Measuring Tape

·Utility Knife ·5PCS Spare Snap-off Blades

·PVC Insulation Tape ·Digital Voltage Tester Pen

·Pliers: 6” Needle-Nose Pliers, 6” Diagonal Cutting Pliers, 7” Combination Pliers, 9” Groove Joint Pliers

·Precision Screwdrivers PH0X50mm, SL3X50mm, PH00X50mm, SL2X50mm

·Magnetic Screwdrivers PH2X100mm, SL6X100mm

·T-type Screwdriver Handle

·12PCS Sockets Set：4, 4.5, 5, 5.5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13mm

·40PCS Screwdriver Bits：(Slotted 4, 5, 6mm, PH0, PH1, PH2, PH3, T10, T15, T20, T25, T27, T30, H3, H4, H5, H6, H7, H8, ADP) X 2

·9PCS Hex Key Set： 1/16, 5/64, 3/32, 1/8, 5/32, 3/16, 7/32, 5/16, 3/8inch

·100PCS Assorted Screws Kit

·Plastic Storage Case

HIGH QUALITY & STANDARDS: Forged from high-quality steel and finished in high-polish chrome, durable, anti-corrosive. Handles are made of TPR material, comfortable for grip, anti-fatigue. All the tools meet or exceed ANSI critical standards.
COMPLETE VARIETIES: A combination of a variety of basic tools, screwdrivers set, bits set, sockets set, pliers set, adjustable wrench, hammer, scissors, measuring tape, hex key set, utility knife, assorted screws kit, insulation tape, voltage tester pen. Limited tools with unlimited functionality.
MULTIFUNCTION: This household tool kit contains tools for small repairs and basic DIY projects like picture hanging, furniture assembling, lighting, screw tightening, woodwork, around the house, office, garage, workshop.
WIDELY USED: It is perfect for homeowners, handymen, construction workers, mechanics. Tool set for men women college students kids, great gift idea.
EASY TO CARRY & STORAGE:This tool kit comes with a sturdy blow-molded case for easy storage and portability. Sturdy interior and organizers of this tool box keep tools in place. Put the side with ”DOWELL” up when opening the toolbox to prevent the tools falling out from the box.


DOWELL 185 Piece Household Tool Set

This tool kit is a great choice for most small repairs and DIY projects around the house and office, such as repairing, outdoor fittings, garden decoration, garage construction, car overhaul, furniture assembling, etc.

It includes most daily use hand tools：

·8” Adjustable Wrench ·8oz/0.25kg Claw Hammer

·Stainless Steel Scissors ·10ft / 3mtr Measuring Tape

·Utility Knife ·5PCS Spare Snap-off Blades

·PVC Insulation Tape ·Digital Voltage Tester Pen

·Pliers: 6” Needle-Nose Pliers, 6” Diagonal Cutting Pliers, 7” Combination Pliers, 9” Groove Joint Pliers

·Precision Screwdrivers PH0X50mm, SL3X50mm, PH00X50mm, SL2X50mm

·Magnetic Screwdrivers PH2X100mm, SL6X100mm

·T-type Screwdriver Handle

·12PCS Sockets Set：4, 4.5, 5, 5.5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13mm

·40PCS Screwdriver Bits：(Slotted 4, 5, 6mm, PH0, PH1, PH2, PH3, T10, T15, T20, T25, T27, T30, H3, H4, H5, H6, H7, H8, ADP) X 2

·9PCS Hex Key Set： 1/16, 5/64, 3/32, 1/8, 5/32, 3/16, 7/32, 5/16, 3/8inch

·100PCS Assorted Screws Kit

·Plastic Storage Case

Product Description

A Basic house repair tool kit is essential whether you are doing basic DIY work or working household projects. M MEEPO 186-piece tool set is suitable for most home repair, auto repair and DIY projects. All the tools are packed in a rugged, compact carrying case for storage and portability. Each tool fits snugly into its respective place to prevent moving around and scraping. 186-piece high quality tool kit includes hammer, flat & phillips screwdriver set, adjustable water pump pliers, tape measure, socket set and socket adapter, screwdriver bit set and holder, Metric allen wrench set, lineman pliers, magnetic level and etc. All tools are made of high quality chrome vanadium steel forged at high temperature, high strength, high hardness, durability, corrosion resistance. This tool set can be used in indoor and outdoor. Suitable for most house maintenance, DIY projects and etc

1-Piece Tool Box (Size: 15x12x3.5 inch )

1-Piece 20oz Hammer with non-slip handle

1-Piece 6 Inch High Leverage Linesman Pliers

1-Piece 8 Inch long nose Pliers

1-Piece 10 inch water pump pliers

5-Piece Precision Slotted and Phillips Screwdriver Set with Rotating Caps

1-Piece screwdriver bit holder and 40-Piece Slotted Phillips Star Bits (size: 3-8/H3-H7/PZ0-PZ3/S1-S3/T8-T40/PH0-PH3)

1-Set of 6 Piece Slotted and Phillips Screwdriver set ( Slotted size: 6*38mm/5*75mm/6*100mm; Phillips size: PH2*38mm/ph1*75mm/ph2*100mm)

1-Piece 9inch Magnetic Level

1-Piece 16Ft/5M Inch Metric Tape Measure

1-Box of Assortments

Tools Includes:

1* 7.5 inch long nose plier

1* 7.1 inch lineman plier

1* 11.5 inch hammer

1* 9 inch magnetic level

From the brand

Cartman owns a high-reputation of the production and sales of auto accessories and tools industry. Our products are widely used in important fields such as automotive, art & craft, industrial & scientific, tools & home improvement. High quality products that solve problems and increase efficiency is our promise to you.

Whether you are a pro mechanic or a do-it-yourself enthusiast, CARTMAN has the tools you need to get the job done.

General Tool Kit

126 Piece tool kit

39 Piece tool kit

148 Piece tool kit

Contains the tools needed for most small repairs around the house
Heat treated and chrome plated to resist corrosion
Securely housed in a handy blow molded case
All tools meet or exceed ANSI critical standards
Meet multi essential household DIY and home improvement needs, such as household repairing, furniture assembling, woodwork etc

Cartman 39-Piece Tool Kit is the perfect choice to accomplish your general purpose projects, repairs, and maintenance at home, garage, office, shop or dormitory, no matter you are a homeowner, a business owner, a college student or a DIYer. It contains all the basic but necessary tools you will need around your home to assemble furniture, install back yard and patio essentials, hang picture frame, fix simple plumbing issues, repair your bicycle, and a lot more. All the tools in this kit are made from high strength materials, precisely manufactured and heat treated.

Perfect Tool Kit for You

  • Giftable
  • High Quality
  • Overall Tools
  • Sturdy Storage Case
Part Lists:

  • Precision Screwdrivers: Phillips #1 , #0; slotted 2.4mm and 3mm;
  • SAE Hex Keys: 1/16″, 5/64″, 3/32″, 1/8″, 5/32″, 3/16″, 7/32″, 1/4″;
  • Screwdriver Bits: Slotted 3-4-5-6-7; Hex H3, H4, H5, H6; AD; Torx Star T10, T15, T20, T25, T30, T40; Phillips PH#0, #1, #2, #3

The set includes

  • 1*10’ Tape Measure
  • 1* 8 oz Claw Hammer
  • 1* 6” Slip Joint Pliers
  • 1* 8” Scissors
  • 1* Utility Snap-off Knife
  • 1* Bit Driver
  • 1* 2” Bit Connector
  • 4* Precision Screwdrivers
  • 8* SAE Hex Keys
  • 20* 1” Screwdriver Bits

The Cartman Tools 39-piece Orange Tool Set comes with attractive orange accents. It is heat treated and chrome plated to resist corrosion. All the tools meet or exceed ANSI critical standards. It contains the tools needed for most household repairs. All tools are packed neatly in a self contained durable molded case.

Product Description

Tool Set 257Pcs General Hand Tool Kit – Sundpey

Sundpey 257Pcs Tool Set is the perfect choice to accomplish your general purpose projects, repairs, and maintenance at home, garage, office, shop or dormitory.No matter you are a homeowner, a business owner, a college student or a DIYer.It contains all the basic but necessary tools you will need around your home to assemble furniture, install back yard and patio essentials, hang picture frame, fix simple plumbing issues, repair your bicycle, and a lot more.Sundpey always insists on providing customers with high-quality tools and good service.If you have any questions, please feel free to message us, we will provide you with a solution that makes you smile as soon as possible.

【Muti-purpose Tools Kit】257pcs basic Tool Kit for household repair and car repair, nearly includs most tools. Perfect suitable for DIY-er, repairmen, construction workers, mechanics and etc.
【Complete Varieties】Useful Tool Set include Combination Wrenches,Adjustable Wrench，Torpedo Level, a complete range of 1/4 inch and 3/8 inch Metric Sockets, Precision Screwdrivers, Hammer, Tape Measure, Pliers, Ratchet Wrench. Variety of 1/4-inch Screwdriver Bits: Phillips, Slotted, Square, Star and Pozi. Soft-grip handle on screwdrivers, pliers, srtipper and hammer provides excellent comfort and control.
【Wide Application】This Tool Kit for home can be used in indoor and outdoor. 257pcs Tool Kit is perfect for home DIY projects and most small repairs, such as furniture assembling, garage constuction, woodwork, plumbing repair, car repairs, outdoor fittings, garden decoration,etc. Case size: 11.82″*3.94″*17.72″. Weight: 10.4lb.
【Sturdy Compact Storage Case】Tools are neatly stored in a sturdy case to keep them secure, clean, organized and easy to find,for easy tool storage and portability. Excellent Gift choice for your family, college students and friends.
【High Quality】These Basic Tool Kits are forged from high-quality steel and finished in high-polish chrome,strength, durability. All the tool kits meet or exceed industry standards. Sundpey provide 12-month warranty, and devoted to provide high quality Tool Set and service to all customers. Kindly Tip: When opening the toolbox, please place the side with ”Sundpey” logo on the top to prevent the tools falling out from the box.
